description:
1. version: openstack-nova-novncproxy-2015.1.2
               openstack-nova-console-2015.1.2
               openstack-nova-scheduler-2015.1.2
               openstack-nova-api-2015.1.2
               openstack-nova-compute-2015.1.2
               openstack-nova-cert-2015.1.2

               python-novaclient-2.23.0

2.Reproduce steps:
* create new port 
* the port is attached to the instance
* when failed to attach, the port is deleted
title: failed to  attach interface for  instance  and then interface is deleted

comments.content:
1. version: openstack-nova-novncproxy-2015.1.2
               openstack-nova-console-2015.1.2
               openstack-nova-scheduler-2015.1.2
               openstack-nova-api-2015.1.2
               openstack-nova-compute-2015.1.2
               openstack-nova-cert-2015.1.2

               python-novaclient-2.23.0

2.Reproduce steps:
* create new port 
* the port is attached to the instance
* when failed to attach, the port is deleted
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhang-haixia

comments.content:
reproducing : 
1、create a vm
2、modify the name of the above vm
3、attach interface to the above vm
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhang-haixia

comments.content: Please attach logs so we can investigate further.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~auggy

comments.content:
can't reproduce this issue on master with fellowing steps:

$ nova interface-attach init --port-id ac7e1565-797c-4333-aca5-2e922aafdf5c
ERROR (CommandError): No server with a name or ID of 'init' exists.

$ neutron port-list |grep ac7e1565-797c-4333-aca5-2e922aafdf5c
| ac7e1565-797c-4333-aca5-2e922aafdf5c |      | fa:16:3e:99:c6:55 | {"subnet_id": "4bf058e8-8e30-487e-8921-150f40f328d6", "ip_address": "10.0.0.5"}
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yuntongjin

comments.content: reproduce this issue in the version which is kilo-2015.1.2
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhang-haixia

comments.content: when the instance hasn't  existed in the hypervisor, failed to attach interface for instance and then interface will be deleted.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhang-haixia
